name: The Fall (itch) (Doronnoga, reutHarari, shlomi386, edenreem)
description:
~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-

The Fall

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-

A tiny apocalypse never looked so festive!

Help this poor snowman collect his body parts after a naughty cat knocked him off the table!  This physics-based collection game was created at Bezalel Academy of art and design.

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-

Controls

Control the snowman with the up, down, left, and right Keyes. Collide with your missing body parts to collect them- Beware of stray piranhas! (How did they get here?!)

~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-~-

 The Team:
